messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.body: We are getting reports of a Nightmare on your station, it uses darkness to heal itself and move quickly. Also its arm blade can destroy all lights on your person if it hits you. Please work out a countermeasure and take it down

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: It has been 4 hours since I successfully sucked my own penis. Things are different now. As soon as mouth-to-penis contact was made I felt a shockwave through my body. I have reason to believe I have super strength and telekinesis now.. 3 hours after contact I noticed a van parked on my street but no one has entered or exited the car since its arrival. I fear for my safety, I'm not sure what sort of power I may have stumbled upon but it's possible that the government has found out. If I don't update this again please send help.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Judging by the announcement, a traitor has been confirmed on your station. If you take them down you will be compensated accordingly.
